message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item that represents the increase in tax accrued but not yet paid from this cash flow statement.

Looking through the cash flow statement, I can see there is a line item called "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 284755.77. This line item represents the change in tax liabilities that have been accrued but not yet paid. Since the value is positive, it indicates an increase in tax payable.

This is exactly what the task is asking for - the value of the increase in amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '284755.77'} }
```
